categories: Category:Members of the Sphere of Imperial Intelligence
Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Charnoq was a Sith Lord of the resurgent Sith Empire during the Galactic War. He was send alongside Lord Ilikith to recovered the Black Codex from the Imperial Agent Cipher Nine on the Star Chamber in Null Zone.

If the player decides to destroy the Codex or refuses to hand it over, Illikith and Charnoq attack the player. If the player chooses the light side dialogue, the Sith are fooled into taking the Agent's encrypted holocommunicator and depart the station. If the player spares Ardun Kothe on Quesh and later joins him on Corellia, Illikith and Charnoq are killed by the Jedi.
